name: GOA EXPRESS FAMILY RESTAURANT ( formerly Pine Wood)

reviews.review_text:
Goa Express in Ponda offers a decent ambiance, but the food quality leaves room for improvement.

Food Experience:

- We ordered Garlic Chicken based on reviews but found it disappointing and not up to the mark.

- The Angara Kebab was okay, nothing extraordinary.

- We tried the Hot and Sour Manchow Chicken Soup, but it was a letdown—the Manchow was cold and lacked crispiness.

- The Special Chicken Biryani was decent, though it didn’t stand out much.

Overall Impression:

While the ambiance is good, the food was average at best. The experience was okay, but there’s definite room for improvement in both taste and consistency.

This place has been our constant, whenever we've had the opportunity to visit it.

The quality of food hasn't dropped at all, the service has remained quick, friendly and always accommodating.

Would definitely recommend the juicy chicken tandoori and the triple schezwan fried rice.

Very pocket friendly and delivers in pure quality of taste.

The only thing that requires a bit of improvement is the cleanliness of the area.

Affordable place for everyone. Taste of food is very nice. Clean and hygienic environment. They serve good amount of quantity. Perfect for small get together and parties. Malaysian chicken and Chicken garlic chicken a must try.
